name: American VR Coasters
description: Collection of American VR Coasters. Experience 4 types of different VR Coasters that will bring you new amazing impressions!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590/AMD FX™ 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows® 8.1 or later, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1060 Storage: 2 GB available space
